quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Bring different beverages to Agostine in Nivalis.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine looks pleased as he drinks the Iron Potion.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine is a tailor. Tailors can't hunt for White Furs. Can you help?

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Bring your White Furs to Agostine. He only wants the best!

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: You found the best White Furs. Now Agostine will make something for 15,000 GP.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine made a pair of fashionable Winter Gloves for you. Congratz!

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: As you know, Agostine is a tailor who can't hunt for White Furs. Can you help again?
They need some [@@611|@@] and one pair of [@@528|@@]

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: You found the best White Furs again. Now Agostine will make something else for an additional 15,000 GP and a pair of Boots.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine made a pair of matching Fur Boots for you. Congratz!
